Set: Tidal Waves is 80% more effective and reduces the mana cost of affected spells by 8%.

(2) Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply nsurance! to their targets that heals them for 918,092 over 15 sec. nsurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 462,711.
(4) Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have nsurance! applied to them. When nsurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,770 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 178 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to charge the device and request a Backfill Barrel near your target's location. Damaging the barrel causes it to explode, inflicting 517,158 Fire damage split between nearby enemies.
Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
